title: GSMA / Smart Data Models - GreenEnergyMeasurement
description: A instantaneous measure of power generation using green energy sources

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity Type. It has to be GreenEnergyMeasurement

solarPowerGenerated.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Specifies the amount of power generated using solar energy. Units:'KWT'. The unit code (text) of measurement given using the UN/CEFACT Common Code (max. 3 characters).

eolicPowerGenerated.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Specifies the amount of power generated using eolic energy. Units:'KWT'. The unit code (text) of measurement given using the UN/CEFACT Common Code (max. 3 characters).

hydroPowerGenerated.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Specifies the amount of power generated using hydropower energy. Units:'KWT'. The unit code (text) of measurement given using the UN/CEFACT Common Code (max. 3 characters).

biomassPowerGenerated.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Specifies the amount of power generated using biomass energy. Units:'KWT'. The unit code (text) of measurement given using the UN/CEFACT Common Code (max. 3 characters).

geothermalPowerGenerated.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Specifies the amount of power generated using geothermal energy. Units:'KWT'. The unit code (text) of measurement given using the UN/CEFACT Common Code (max. 3 characters).
